channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MI

item.title: Report X-2024010540
item.description:
Report X-2024010540

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-26T15:11:09+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-16
  • City: LIVONIA
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: WITH PROPER PPE AND DECISION TREE, RESPONDER RESPONDED TO WET PACKAGE ON THE UNLOAD. UPON ARRIVAL FOUND A FLAMMABLE 3 DIAMOND LABEL PRINTING INK WITH A WET CORNER. RESPONDER TOOK BACK TO DMP AREA FOR PROCESSING.

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: THE PACKAGE WAS DISCOVERED ON THE BELT WITH A SMALL LEAK IN THE CORNER OF THE BOX. ONCE OPENED, RESPONDER DISCOVERED BOTH CONTAINERS WERE LEAKING FROM THE CAP.

item.title: Report X-2024010592
item.description:
Report X-2024010592

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-25T15:11:44+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-19
  • City: ROMULUS
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDED TO A PACKAGE THAT NEEDED TO BE REWRAPPED. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED ONE BROWN INNER BOX MARKED AS NON-SPILLABLE, MODEL NP 12-12. FOUR BATTERIES CLASSIFIED AS BATTERIES, WET, NON-SPILLABLE WERE INSIDE THE INNER BOX. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THIS PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED FROM CT, USA USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER 038320, COOPERSURGICAL, INC., 50 CORPORATE DR., TRUMBULL CT 06611-1349.

item.title: Report X-2024010416
item.description:
Report X-2024010416

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-23T15:11:55+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-09
  • City: MADISON HEIGHTS
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDED TO A SMALL LEAKING PACKAGE MARKED WITH DIAMOND LABEL- FLAMMABLE LIQUID 3 UN1263 PAINT. THE CONTENTS WAS 2- 1 GALLON CONTAINERS OF MOHAWK DURACOAT LACQUER. THE LID WAS OFF THE CANS. BOTH GALLONS WERE ABSORBED WITH ZEP ZORBENT AND PLACED IN GREEN DMP BAG WITH WET CARDBOARD. AWAITING FURTHER INSTUCTIONS FOR DISPOSAL.
